HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
Mod Manager was updated for RimWorld 1.2, with a number of improvements and bugfixes; - user data (e.g. mod colours) should no longer randomly reset - Mod Manager should be much more response for large mod lists - You can again create multiple local copies for backups - CrossPromotion preview images can now be cached in the system temp dir - CrossPromotion cache can be cleared by the user (see the mod settings)
|Some issues still remain; - Importing pre-1.1 modlists works unreliably (will likely not be fixed anymore). - (Mass) subscribing to missing steam mods is not yet hooked up. - The auto-sort button does not work correctly. - And a variety of other small issues.
|I'm working on getting all the pre-1.1 features back up and running, and some generous volunteers and I are working on what will be the next stage for Mod Manager. You'll hear more about where Mod Manager is going, and how you can have a say in the process, soonâ„¢.
